page.title: 02NORTH DURHAM VILLAGE (CONT)
page.content: The Pubs often provide entertainment with a piano, a Juke Box or a Fruit Machine. Games like Dominoes and Darts are played. Beer Gardens where people can take their children for a family outing are becoming more popular. Children still entertain themselves with the same games. Games like Tag, Hide and Seek which were played over 60 years ago in the Junior School which is 64 years old this year (1985) are still played by today's children. Other well known games are a type of marbles called 'Blobby Three Hole' played with 3 holes instead of 1 and 'Monty Bitty' where one team of children mounted on their team mates backs try to knock off their opponents from the other team. This area has changed a lot over the last 20 years and many pits have closed.
